Shock Treatment

Ano: 1981

IMDb ID: tt0083067

Classificação: 5.7

Sinopse: Following on from "The Rocky Horror Picture Show", this musical is set several years later in Brad and Janet Majors' hometown, which has become a giant TV station; residents are either participants or viewers. Brad and Janet have been married for several years now, but their romance has slouched and slumped. Ostensibly to fix their marriage, Brad is imprisoned on the program "Dentonvale" (the local mental hospital) while Janet is conscripted to become a new star. As Janet is entranced by the high life, she forgets Brad. Who is trying to woo her away? And why?—Miss Rori Stevens
